commit.message:
re PR target/90963 (FAIL: gcc.c-torture/execute/built-in-setjmp.c execution test)

	PR target/90963
	* config/pa/pa.md (builtin_longjmp): Restore hard_frame_pointer_rtx
	using saved frame pointer.
